title: ACCESSIBLE

roomimage.name: gallery-rooms-thumb-25
roomimage.alt: Room with bed, tv, showing view of city.

long_description: Studio Suites are up to 336 sqft and include a King, Queen, or two Double Beds. A bit of extra space can do wonders during special events, extended stays and staycactions. Studio Suites include a living/sitting area and oversized chair with with ottoman. Some rooms include views. Parlor Suites are up to 416 sq ft and inlude a sofa and coffee table. Max occupancy for single suites is three persons, for double suites is four persons.
